description:
Ekoda-chan ponders the long dark night of the soul, featuring director Sugii Gisaburo (Glass Mask, Touch, Street Fighter) and Romi Park (Fullmetal Alchemist, Attack on Titan).
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: Kantoku to Ekoda-chan Ra no Zadankai - Sugii Gisaburou x Paku Romi
Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: The Director and Ekoda-chan`s Naked Chat 2 - Sugii Gisaburo x Park Romi
臨死!! 江古田ちゃん 監督と江古田ちゃん裸[ら]の座談会 杉井ギサブロー x 朴璐美
